mapper.sql: id, title, content, subject_id, user_id, creat_time, difficult, classify, visit_num, tag, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3
mapper.insert: insert into ts_question (id, title, content, subject_id, user_id, creat_time, difficult, classify, visit_num, tag, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{difficult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ts_question
id,
title,
content,
subject_id,
user_id,
creat_time,
difficult,
classify,
visit_num,
tag,
attribute1,
attribute2,
attribute3,

mapper.update:
update ts_question
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subject_id = #{subjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
difficult = #{difficult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
classify = #{classify,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
visit_num = #{visitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tag = #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ts_question set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subject_id = #{subjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, difficult = #{difficult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classify = #{classify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visit_num = #{visitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tag = #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select q.*, u.nick_name as nick_name from ts_question q LEFT JOIN ts_user u ON q.user_id = u.id where subject_id = #{subjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
